definition: Wu Bangguo (1941-), PRC electrical engineer and politician, polituro member from 2002

sentences.english: Wu left Wellington for Auckland by a special plane on the morning of May 27.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國是27日上午乘專機離開惠靈頓抵達奧克蘭的。

sentences.english: Wu expressed appreciation and thanks for this.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國對此表示讚賞和感謝。

sentences.english: Wu noted that the two economies are complementary to each other and share huge potentials in the economic and trade cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國說，中孟經濟具有互補性，經貿合作潛力很大。

sentences.english: Wu said he was glad to meet Prime Minister Putin again.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國說，很高興時隔不久再次見到總理先生。

sentences.english: Wu also introduced the economic situation and development of China.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國還介紹了中國經濟形勢和發展情況。

sentences.english: In the evening, Speaker Mami held a welcome banquet for Chairman Wu.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，馬米議長爲吳邦國委員長舉行了歡迎宴會。

sentences.english: Chairman Wu's other companions arrived in the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國委員長的其他陪同人員同機抵達。

sentences.english: Prior to the talks, Wu Bangguo held a ceremony to welcome Kim Yong-nam and his delegation for their visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，吳邦國舉行儀式，歡迎金永南一行訪華。

sentences.english: Papoulias asked Hu to conveyed his best wishes for President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 帕普利亞斯請吳邦國轉達對胡錦濤主席的良好祝願。

sentences.english: Wu also introduced the democracy and legal construction in China to the visiting guests.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國還向客人介紹了中國民主法制建設情況。

sentences.english: Alencar said he was delighted to welcome Wu in Brazilia.
sentences.chinese: 阿倫卡爾表示非常高興在巴西利亞歡迎吳邦國委員長。

sentences.english: Rebelo first extended warm welcome for Wu's arrival.
sentences.chinese: 雷貝洛首先對吳邦國委員長的來訪表示熱烈歡迎。

sentences.english: Wu noted that the parliamentary relations are an important part of the state-to-state relations.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國說，議會關係是國家關係的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Wu's speech ended amid a long period of warm applauses.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國委員長的演講在長時間熱烈的掌聲中結束。

sentences.english: Wu delivered an important speech amidst warm applauses.
sentences.chinese: 在熱烈的掌聲中，吳邦國發表了重要演講。

sentences.english: Other accompanying officials arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國委員長的其他陪同人員同機抵達。

definition: to have an audience (with the Emperor)
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
Yue state/generic term for states in south China or southeast Asia at different historical periods
Lelang commandery (108 BC-313 AD), one of four Han dynasty commanderies in north Korea
to engage in wars of aggression at will (idiom)/militaristic/bellicose
